## HDOMBehaviorAttribs.\_\_release property

HDOM behavior control attribute. If `false`<!-- -->, hdom will not attempt to call `release()` lifecycle methods on this element or any of its children.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
__release?: boolean;
```
